data.md:MetaData: Lithology of sediment core LOCHINSK, Lochinskoe, Belarus
Location: Centre of lake. Core diameter: 10 cm. Area of site: 58 ha. Site description: Lake. Surrounding vegetation: Alnus, Pinus, Betula and cultivated land.
Razvitie prirody Belorrussii v golotsene [Holocane environmental changes of Byelorussia]
